name: Trash in the attic: Anniversary Edition
name_original: Trash in the attic: Anniversary Edition
description:
Get on screen! The smash hit antiques programme, Trash in the Attic, is being filmed in your home town, this is your chance to get on TV and become a star! Get your face in front of the camera by any means necessary and watch that viewer count skyrocket! You're gonna be a hit baby!  

------------------------------------

Controls -

WASD - Move

-------------------------------------
